ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/api/service) that the resource is associated with.

Country.description: The [ISO-3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) country code of the country this configuration will be applied to. If this is a global configuration, Country will take the value `all`.
